Entries.spring_Tue: The valley is so pretty in Spring. I'll enjoy the view on my walk to town for Tuesday workout.
Entries.summer_Tue: Remember that I'm taking the day off today. I'll be at the gym.#$e#It's leg day.$2
Entries.fall_Tue: The leaves are so pretty on my walk to town. Tuesdays in autumn are my favorite.
Entries.winter_Tue: It's gossip and gym day! See you this evening, honey.
Entries.spouseRoom_Robin: I'm looking for some design inspiration.#$e#I love having all of my books here.
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Let me know if you need any help today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Rainy days let you know what condition your roof is in. Luckily, we're in good shape!
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I got up early and made breakfast. Here you go.[194 195 201 210 211]#$e#I hope it tastes OK. I'm a better carpenter than I am a cook.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Days like this can feel really long when you're working outdoors.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: It's pouring out there. We should lay around in bed all day.$5
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your rainy day? I'm impressed that you were out there getting things done!
Entries.patio_Robin: I love having this space. I hope I figure out what to do with it some day.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I could really go for some fried chicken. Someone should invent that!$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: The sound of the rain just lulls me to sleep...
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I made soup! I threw it out though, it was awful.$h#$b#Do you want to get takeout from Gus?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I'm glad you're home... Let's hop in bed and warm each other up.$5
Entries.Rainy_Night_Robin: How was your day today, dear? Are you cold?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: This house is holding up well! It's still in great shape.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @. I found this when I was out yesterday... [384 386 787 107 70 114]#$e#I hope you can use it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Keep your eyes peeled for good places to dig! It's a great way to find resources.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Thanks for always providing us such great food and ingredients.#$e#Here, I made you snack. [196 223 604 610 651]
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, @! Here, have some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My mornings are better with a nice cup of coffee.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Do you want to go to bed early?$5
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: We should go stargazing some night. Maru taught me a lot about the stars.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I love spending evenings with you.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I never thought I'd receive another mermaid's pendant! I feel so fortunate to have you.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I wonder if Emily would make me a new outfit to wear at home.#$e#Maybe something skimpy.$5
Entries.Indoor_Night_Robin: You're always working so hard for us.#$e#Let me help you relax tonight.$5
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's so beautiful here. We're very fortunate.#$e#Could you imagine being stuck inside working in a cubicle today?
Entries.Outdoor_1: I have a few small repairs to make on the house today. I want to take care of them now before they become a big issue.
Entries.Outdoor_2: Today's going to be great, I can feel it.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Do you ever buy supplies from Marnie?#$b#I think some of her prices are a little high.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't forget to stay hydrated, dear.#$e#Make sure to get something to eat, too. Keep your energy up!$h
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today? One of us probably should.
Entries.OneKid_1: I had a wild dream where %kid1 turned into a dove and flew away. It was pretty creepy.
Entries.OneKid_3: I forgot how much work it is to be a parent. I'm glad you help out so much.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I love you and the kids so much. Our life together has really turned out well.
Entries.Good_0: I thought I might miss the mountain, but I really love living in the valley.
Entries.Good_1: I got flustered the first time we met.$l#$b# Sorry if I came off a little rude.$h
Entries.Good_2: @? I love you. Have a great day today.
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look great today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... I cherish it as much as I cherish you.$l
Entries.Good_6: Take care of yourself out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Entries.Good_8: I've got a lot to do today. Don't worry about me, go and have a great day.$l
Entries.Neutral_0: I look forward to growing old with you.
Entries.Neutral_1: Did anyone live here before your grandfather?
Entries.Neutral_2: What do you have going on today?
Entries.Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_4: I'm going to clean the fridge tomorrow.
Entries.Neutral_5: I wish we had a bank to keep our money in. I guess our town is just too small to have one.
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what the other moms are doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.Neutral_8: It's amazing how clean we're able to keep the house.#$e#I thought it would be worse living on a farm.
Entries.Neutral_9: I hope we'll live here our entire lives.
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Did we get married too fast?$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?$s
Entries.Bad_3: Is everything OK between us? You've been acting different lately.$s
Entries.Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#Maybe you should try to spend a little more time with me.$a
Entries.Bad_6: Is this the life you envisioned when you asked me to marry you?$s
Entries.Bad_7: Do you remember when you used to work on our relationship$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if this was all a huge mistake.$s
Entries.spring_2: What do you have planned for spring this year?
Entries.spring_1: Wow, you sure know how to bring a girl into the new year...$l
Entries.spring_12: The egg festival is tomorrow. Do you think Abigail will enter the egg hunt?
Entries.spring_10: I love spring cleaning. It feels great to get everything clean and organized.$h
Entries.summer_1: It's summer! Bring on the warm weather.$h
Entries.summer_9: You really had me sweating last night, especially in this heat.$l
Entries.summer_2: Do you have any big plans for this summer?#$e#Wow, really?
Entries.fall_1: I love fall. The colors are glorious.
Entries.fall_20: We should make sure we're ready for winter. Do we have enough hay to last the season?
Entries.fall_2: All of the best things happen in fall. The fair, Spirit's Eve, my birthday...$h
Entries.winter_1: It's winter! Have you ever heard rumors about the Glacier Fish?#$b#I wonder if it really exists.
Entries.winter_7: Tomorrow is the Festival of Ice. I wonder what crazy sculpture Abigail will create.
Entries.winter_28: It's New Year's Eve; letâ€™s have fun tonight!! [348]$h#$e#I'm so looking forward to a new year with you.

Entries.funReturn_Robin: Welcome home, hon. How was your day?

Entries.funLeave_Robin: {{Random: I thought I might miss the mountain but I really love living in the valley., I got flustered the first time we met.$l#$b# Sorry if I came off a little rude.$h, @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h, I've got a lot to do today so don't worry about me. Go and have a great day.$l, I love our life here.$h}}
Entries.funReturn_Robin: Hi Sweetie! I'm so glad you're home.
